languages.text: "Говорить со мной". {n}Из голоса Ульфара испаряется обычная бравая веселость.{/n} "Ведаешь ли ты, Торбальд, куда бранная тропа увела мою стаю, Зловещий вой?"
"Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"
languages.original_text: "Говорить со мной". {n}Из голоса Ульфара испаряется обычная бравая веселость.{/n} "Ведаешь ли ты, Торбальд, куда бранная тропа увела мою стаю, Зловещий вой?"

traits.locale_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Famehungry?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “要和你说话的人是我。”{n}乌尔法的语气不再带着一贯的玩笑意味。{/n}“我问你，索巴德。你知道我的狼群‘怒嚎者’去了什么地方吗？”
languages.original_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: “要和你说话的人是我。”{n}乌尔法的语气不再带着一贯的玩笑意味。{/n}“我问你，索巴德。你知道我的狼群‘渴名者’去了什么地方吗？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺と話せ」{n}ウルファーの声からは、普段の図々しいまでの明るさが消え失せている。{/n}「おい、トールバルド、この戦闘で俺の群れ、破滅の咆哮はどうなってる」
languages.original_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺と話せ」{n}ウルファーの声からは、普段の図々しいまでの明るさが消え失せている。{/n}「おい、トールバルド、この戦闘で俺の群れ、破滅の咆哮はどうなってる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Dirígete a mí». {n}La habitual jovialidad de Ulfar se ha evaporado de su voz.{/n} «¿Sabes, Thorbald, por qué derroteros ha llevado la guerra a mi jauría, el Aullido Torvo?».
languages.original_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: «Dirígete a mí». {n}La habitual jovialidad de Ulfar se ha evaporado de su voz.{/n} «¿Sabes, Thorbald, por qué derroteros ha llevado la guerra a mi manada, los Hambrientos de Fama?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Allons droit au but ! » {n}La voix d'Ulfar a soudainement perdu toute trace de sa jovialité habituelle.{/n} « Sais-tu, Thorbald, où la soif de bataille a conduit ma meute, les Hurleurs sanguinaires ? »
languages.original_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: « Allons droit au but ! » {n}La voix d'Ulfar a soudainement perdu toute trace de sa jovialité habituelle.{/n} « Sais-tu, Thorbald, où la soif de bataille a conduit ma meute, les Dévoreurs de gloire ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Sprecht mit mir." {n}Ulfars für gewöhnlich freche Freundlichkeit ist aus seiner Stimme verschwunden.{/n} "Wisset Ihr, Thorbald, wohin der Pfad der Schlacht mein Rudel geführt hat, die Baleful Howl?"
languages.original_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: "Sprecht mit mir." {n}Ulfars übliche ungestüme Heiterkeit ist aus seiner Stimme verschwunden.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, Thorbald, wohin der Pfad der Schlacht mein Rudel, die Famehungry, verschlagen hat?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Konuş." {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, her zamanki küstahça neşesinden yoksun çıkıyor.{/n} "Thorbald, savaşın yolu sürüm Uğursuz Uluma'yı nereye götürdü?"
languages.original_text: "Speak to me." {n}Ulfar's usual brash joviality has evaporated from his voice.{/n} "Know you, Thorbald, whither the path of battle has led my pack, the Baleful Howl?"

traits.locale_text: "Konuş." {n}Ulfar'ın sesindeki sıradan küstah neşe ortadan kayboluyor.{/n} "Thorbald, savaşın yolu sürüm Uğursuz Uluma'yı nereye götürdü?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
